title: The Wealthy Young Master Has Turned Villain - Novel Updates
author: 凤元糖果
description:
He cherished her and said, “Silly girl, I will protect you in the future. No one can bully you.”

He was the young master of a wealthy family with the legendary royal bloodline passed down through thousands of years. He was like a jade tree, elegant and noble. 

Such a cold and unfeminine her was the only person he put on the tip of his heart and loved her more than his life.

She was a disguised all-rounder Cinderella. Notorious and framed by her sister, she was betrayed by her fiance and plotted against by her family.

She was rescued by him in a desperate life or death situation. From then on, her old life ended and she embarked on the road of a peak legend.

Since disguise couldn’t achieve the peace she wanted, she became a bloodthirsty black-hearted lotus. No longer forbearing, she was beautiful and wild. >
